title: Kodanuki Ponpo
synopsis: A music video for the song "Kodanuki Ponpo" by Atomu Shimojou. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.
staff: [['Inui, Hiroki', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Kouki, Ooyama', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Suzuki, Etsuo', ['Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Shimojou, Atomu', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
